text:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/associations/associations-v4#remove-record-associations>

FYI, the example request for this one is incorrect. Should be:
```{
"inputs": [
    {
      "from": {
        "id": "12345"
      },
      "to": [
        {
          "id": "67891"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "from": {
        "id": "9876"
      },
      "to": [
        {
          "id": "54321"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}```

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/associations/association-details>

Associations guide is a broken link
